title: UNABLE TO LOG IN.
body:
Ithing is, I was just playing a game. then i finished up and BAM kicked out from losing connection.

I'm trying to log into my account. I'm on the log in page. and all its saying is :Connection failure, unable to connect to pvp.net.

HALP!!

replies.body: I'm re-installing as i type. its really crapp i spent the last half an hour trying to open the damn game. :(
It's not just you mate, I am encountering the same problem, hopefully Riot works something out soon :)
